arts.ttl: Sunday’s briefing: Sunderland end Arsenal run and Wolves close on new boss
arts.sum: Elsewhere, Pep Guardiola backed Rodri to recover his top form and full fitness for Manchester City.

arts.ttl: Gary O’Neil says Arsenal’s draw at Sunderland is not a bad result
arts.sum: Gary O’Neil praised Arsenal’s entertaining draw during their Premier League game against Sunderland, suggesting that the Gunners will ultimately view the point as a positive result. The match at the Stadium of Light proved to be a stern test, as the Black Cats have established themselves as a formidable side at home this season. arts.ttl: Advertising boards & chaos - how Sunderland stopped Arsenal machine
arts.sum: Moving advertising boards and causing chaos - how brilliant Sunderland stopped the Arsenal machine.

arts.ttl: Arsenal’s result vs Sunderland matters a lot less when you realise what 72-touch star did
arts.sum: Arsenal dropped points in disappointing fashion against Sunderland on Saturday evening, although one of Mikel Arteta’s players produced an excellent performance. Brian Brobbey scooped home...

arts.ttl: Sunderland battle for draw as Arsenal's winning streak ends
arts.sum: Brian Brobbey scores a dramatic injury-time equaliser for Sunderland against Arsenal, who concede their first goals since September to end a run of 10 consecutive wins in all competitions.

arts.ttl: Arteta explains how Sunderland created ‘chaos’ in Arsenal draw
arts.sum: Mikel Arteta praised Sunderland for their ability to create “chaos” with free kicks, long throws and direct balls against Arsenal on Saturday. The Black Cats held the Premier League leaders at the Stadium of Light, taking the lead in the first half before coming from behind late on to draw 2-2. arts.ttl: “It’s outstanding” James McFadden comments on Arsenal’s draw at Sunderland
arts.sum: James McFadden expressed admiration for the performances of both Sunderland and Arsenal when the two sides met in the Premier League today. The Gunners faced a Black Cats team that appeared ready to match them every step of the way, ensuring a competitive and entertaining contest. arts.ttl: Mikel Arteta gives clear Arsenal response to Sunderland draw - 'not our standards'
arts.sum: Arsenal were denied an eleventh consecutive victory away to Sunderland in the Premier League after a late Brian Brobbey goal

arts.ttl: Regis Le Bris Confirms Sunderland Used Bizarre Tactic in 2-2 Draw vs Arsenal
arts.sum: Sunderland boss Regis Le Bris has admitted his side used bizarre tactics to hinder Arsenal in their 2-2 draw on Saturday evening.

arts.ttl: Arsenal legend points finger of blame at unlikely star for mistake in Sunderland draw
arts.sum: Arsenal let what was potentially a priceless win slip through their fingers after conceding a late equaliser away to Sunderland and David Seaman has shared his thoughts on the result
